storage.content: {"docs":{"20250612150826.json":{"root_path":"docs\\system_design","filename":"20250612150826.json","content":"{\"Implementation approach\":\"We will implement a simple calculator app using Python. We will use basic Python classes to handle different operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The user interface will be designed using a simple text-based interface for both desktop and mobile devices.\",\"File list\":[\"main.py\"],\"Data structures and interfaces\":\"\\nclassDiagram\\n    class Calculator {\\n        +add(a: float, b: float) float\\n        +subtract(a: float, b: float) float\\n        +multiply(a: float, b: float) float\\n        +divide(a: float, b: float) float\\n    }\\n    class UserInterface {\\n        -Calculator calculator\\n        +display()\\n        +get_input()\\n        +clear()\\n    }\\n\",\"Program call flow\":\"\\nsequenceDiagram\\n    participant UI as UserInterface\\n    participant C as Calculator\\n    UI->>C: add(a, b)\\n    C-->>UI: return result\\n    UI->>C: subtract(a, b)\\n    C-->>UI: return result\\n    UI->>C: multiply(a, b)\\n    C-->>UI: return result\\n    UI->>C: divide(a, b)\\n    C-->>UI: return result\\n    UI->>UI: clear()\\n\",\"Anything UNCLEAR\":\"\"}"}}}

20250612150826.json.content:
{"Implementation approach":"We will implement a simple calculator app using Python. We will use basic Python classes to handle different operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The user interface will be designed using a simple text-based interface for both desktop and mobile devices.","File list":["main.py"],"Data structures and interfaces":"
classDiagram
    class Calculator {
        +add(a: float, b: float) float
        +subtract(a: float, b: float) float
        +multiply(a: float, b: float) float
        +divide(a: float, b: float) float
    }
    class UserInterface {
        -Calculator calculator
        +display()
        +get_input()
        +clear()
    }
","Program call flow":"
sequenceDiagram
    participant UI as UserInterface
    participant C as Calculator
    UI->>C: add(a, b)
    C-->>UI: return result
    UI->>C: subtract(a, b)
    C-->>UI: return result
    UI->>C: multiply(a, b)
    C-->>UI: return result
    UI->>C: divide(a, b)
    C-->>UI: return result
    UI->>UI: clear()
","Anything UNCLEAR":""}
